sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Prescribed Burning Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Prescribed Burning Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Rules. The Department, in consultation with the Office of the State Fire Marshal, shall promulgate rules to implement this Act, including but not limited to, rules governing prescribed burn manager certification and revocation and rules governing prescribed burn prescriptions
sections.text: Rules. The Department, in consultation with the Office of the State Fire Marshal, shall promulgate rules to implement this Act, including but not limited to, rules governing prescribed burn manager certification and revocation and rules governing prescribed burn prescriptions.

sections.heading: Exemption. Nothing in this Act shall be construed as:
sections.text: Exemption. Nothing in this Act shall be construed as:

sections.heading: Fees. The Department may charge and collect fees from persons applying for safety training and certification as a certified prescribed burn manager.
sections.text: Fees. The Department may charge and collect fees from persons applying for safety training and certification as a certified prescribed burn manager.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
